rules_text:
Lifelink
When Gothr Cutthroat enters, surveil 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
When Gothr Cutthroat dies, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
[i]The streets of Gothr are full of fear and desire.
[/i]
